Module jfx
Package com.CodeSmell.smell

Class OrphanVariable

java.lang.Object
com.CodeSmell.smell.Smell
com.CodeSmell.smell.OrphanVariable
public class OrphanVariable extends Smell

An Orphan Variable/Constant Class can be defined as a collection of constants that belong elsewhere than the class they are defined within.

A constant can be defined as an attribute that is a primitive type and possess the following modifiers: "FINAL", and "STATIC". However, private static final attributes can only be accessed by the class that owns the attribute, therefore "PUBLIC" is an additional requirement for the Orphan Variable code smell.

    • detectAll

      protected static void detectAll(LinkedList<Smell.CodeFragment> detections)

      In order for a class to be labeled as having an Orphan Variable code smell, the following conditions must be satisfied:

      1) The class must posses attributes that can be considered a constant (primitive type and public, static, final modifiers)

      2) These attributes are not used at all within the class that they are defined, but they are used elsewhere in other classes

      Parameters:
      detections - The list of detections for the OrphanVariable smell

    • hasConstants

      protected static boolean hasConstants(CPGClass cpgClass)
      Determine if a given class has constants within its attributes. Constants are attributes which possess static, final modifiers. However, it is additionally necessary that these attributes are public as private attributes with these modifiers can only be accessed within that class itself.
      Parameters:
      cpgClass - The class being analyzed
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating if the class has constants or not

    • returnFilteredClassStat

      private static List<ClassStat> returnFilteredClassStat()
      Return a list of filtered ClassStats, this list contains ClassStat objects where the CPGClass contains constants as attributes.
      Returns:
      A list of filtered ClassStats with constants

    • returnFilteredAttributeStat

      private static List<AttributeStat> returnFilteredAttributeStat(List<AttributeStat> attributeStats, CPGClass parentClass)
      Return a list of filtered AttributeStats, this list contains AttributeStat objects which are of primitive type, has the necessary modifiers to be a constant, the attribute is used within cpg and the parentClass of the attribute does not use the attribute.
      Parameters:
      attributeStats - All the AttributeStats of a given ClassStat
      parentClass - The class that the ClassStat is referencing
      Returns:
      A list of filtered AttributeStats for all the class constants

    • returnAffectedClasses

      private static CPGClass[] returnAffectedClasses(List<AttributeStat> filteredStats, CPGClass parentClass)
      Iterate through all the AttributeStats and add all classes which call each reference Attribute within each AttributeStat along with the parent CPGClass and return an array of CPGClass.
      Parameters:
      filteredStats - A list of filtered AttributeStats for the constants of a given CPGClass
      parentClass - The parentClass which owns these constants
      Returns:
      An array consisting of all classes related to the constants

    • returnAffectedAttributes

      private static CPGClass.Attribute[] returnAffectedAttributes(List<AttributeStat> filteredStats)
      Return an array consisting of all the constants, given a list of filtered AttributeStats containing references to the constants of a given class.
      Parameters:
      filteredStats - A list of filtered AttributeStats for the constants of a given class
      Returns:
      An array of all the attributes that are constants

    • returnAffectedMethods

      private static CPGClass.Method[] returnAffectedMethods(List<AttributeStat> filteredStats)
      Iterate through the filtered AttributeStats and return an array consisting of all the methods which call each Attribute.
      Parameters:
      filteredStats - A list of filtered AttributeStats for the constants of a given class
      Returns:
      An array of all the methods which call the constants of a given class

    • returnAffectedInstructions

      private static CPGClass.Method.Instruction[] returnAffectedInstructions(CPGClass.Attribute[] affectedAttributes, CPGClass.Method[] affectedMethods)
      Iterate through all the affected methods and find the affected instructions. Starting with the "METHOD" instruction, followed by all "FIELD_IDENTIFIER" instructions that has a code field matching the name of one of the affected attributes.
      Parameters:
      affectedAttributes - All the constants of a given class
      affectedMethods - All the methods which call the constants
      Returns:
      An array of affected instructions
